post.body: I think that's it. I know it works for me with playing guitar, f'rinstance.
I'm not sure there is a secret. Advice from pros always seems to say "make yourself do it". Discipline=my bugbear.
January essay material, perhaps? :)
Hmm, that's odd. What address did you send to?
Righto. You coming out tonight, BTW?
*shrug* Another little mystery, I guess.
Not in the spamtrap, no. Besides, you're on my Contacts list, so you shouldn't end up in there. *shrug*
Heh, no worries - as long as it's sincere, I'm a happy editor. Weird it didn't show up, though - maybe mistyped my address?
Hey, that's a point - might you be able to finish that review this weekend?
GOOOOOO!!!!!
Hey, bro - thanks for the postcard!
Will it not impede aerodynamics? Top points for style, tho.
Masochist! Nice pic of you in lycra on Facebook, too. Grrrowr! ;)
Original Source Mint & Tea Tree FTW.
Cheers dude - not so much run-down as perpetually tired. Which I guess is the same thing. Selah. :)
Morning, Scumlord - you're sounding how I feel, there.
Yeah, Brighton's like that sometimes. :)
Bloody hell, squire! Good to see you back again, though.
A new year of full hearts and less pain, let's hope. :)
channelling the Beats, brother- kudos. :) Happy new year to you.
True that. :)
I'm woefully unstudied in his early stuff; one of many things I plan to remedy this year coming. Sharp guy, Rucker.
Rucker is a huge Beats fan, also. It expresses very differently in him, though. ;)
I think it's partly your b/ground in copywriting, also; kinda the best bits of both. Terse but real, upfront, in motion.
That said, Kerouac is a disappointment when re-read as an older (!=wiser) person. Wonder if he believed own hype too much.
It shows. Your clipped descriptives. The snapshot dialogue. The sense of *nowness* - not fashion-now, but being-now.
Wow - that must have been quite something!
THE FUTURE IS NOW - IT HAS CONSEQUENCES! ;)
Wow, now we can spam your living room with pictures of our junk! :D
Welcome to the machine! 1/4 into my ARC of Mind Over Ship, and enjoying greatly so far...
is going out. For the *epic lulz*, or some such thing.
The more plaudits MGMT receive, the more I realise that I'm well out of step with the world. Because, to my ears, they're plain awful.
is up at 2:16am reading about Jonestown. Maybe his psychoses are entirely self-inflicted after all.
has total enthusiasm FAIL. Bath time.
says "all cold, no sleep and no sunlight makes Paul something-something... "
is up and about, and much more alive than yesterday. Now, time to get busy...
is a walking car-wreck. Not quite the running start he had planned for 2009, today, really...
is savagely wasted. Happy new year, innit?
goes out to drink / for one last time / before twelve months / of self-imposed sobriety. Happy New Year, ladies and gents.
is reading Allen Ginsberg's poetry. Yeah, it's a non-stop party round my place, I tell ya.
